mods.abstract: NOTICE. COMMITTED to Jail in the Parish of Rapides, on the 20th Sept., a Runaway named BOOKER, says he belongs to Dempsey Eatman, residing in the Parish of DeSoto. Said boy is 5 feet 10 or 11 inches high, about 20 or 21 years of age, griff color, has a small scar or mole on his right jaw. The owner of said boy will please come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, or he will be dealt with according to law. ISRAEL GOREE, Jailor. sep22-tf
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
